definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期后，你一般不会得到任何现金返还。

sentences.english: You have reviewed the cash flow statement before investment decision is made.
sentences.chinese: 在进行投资决定前，你会先详阅综合现金流量表。

sentences.english: Please come back to renew your passbook or get your money in seven days.
sentences.chinese: 七天后来补领新存折，也可以提现金。

sentences.english: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.chinese: 我用现金从这家商店买下这辆汽车。

sentences.english: My parents jack up my allowance, and I ll be maxing on cash.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母增加我的零用钱，我的现金就会很宽裕了。

sentences.english: Tokens in cash or kind to staff are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 同敬怀仁院禁止所有工作人员接受任何现金或礼物。

sentences.english: Sir, would you like to pay in cash or sign your bill?
sentences.chinese: 先生，请问您是用现金结账还是签单啊？

sentences.english: Enjoy a free $25 cash voucher with a purchase of two quarts of ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 惠顾两磅装雪糕两筒，可免费获赠$25现金券一张。

sentences.english: Interest arising on the overall cash balance attributable to individual donors will be recorded in the account.
sentences.chinese: 将在帐目中记录各捐助方现金总结余产生的利息。

sentences.english: And at what rate do you discount those cash flows?
sentences.chinese: 现金流折现率又是多少呢？

sentences.english: This busy pace accompanies lots of cash flow.
sentences.chinese: 这种繁忙的节奏意味着现金流转量很大。

sentences.english: The company shall disclose the situation of implementation of the cash dividends policy in the current reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 公司还应披露现金分红政策在本报告期的执行情况。

sentences.english: If I have a wad of cash, I find myself going through it quickly.
sentences.chinese: 若我手里现在一卷现金，我会将它一扫而空。

sentences.english: The filter-through of stimulus cash to the pachinko parlours has historical precedent.
sentences.chinese: 弹球馆通过现金刺激计划受益是有历史先例。

sentences.english: TEPCO has a cash flow of 2 trillion yen.
sentences.chinese: 东电目前拥有约2万亿日元的现金流。

sentences.english: Pay at the door, cash only.
sentences.chinese: 活动当日付于签到到，接受现金。

definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
to transfer (money to a bank account)
